ModMetaData.name: Medicine Expanded (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Neceros
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/buuPQel.png[/img] Update of Neceross mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2049984501
[img]https://i.imgur.com/pufA0kM.png[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://invite.gg/Mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/MedicineExpanded][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img] Expand your medicine cabinet with pain reduction drugs. Introduces a line of drugs with amazing pain suppression and euphoria inducing effects, though they do cause chemical addiction. Also, this mod allows you to make medicine in bulk.
[b]Sorry, but I'm no longer maintaining my mods. Maybe in the future[/b] [i]Please note 99% of my mods are MIT licensed, meaning you can do whatever you want with it with the requirement of crediting me.[/i]
[b]Please note:[/b] These drugs are designed for rimworld fun. Do not expect real world similarities in effects and addictiveness. This is a game.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/g69KRUw.png[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/vKtwA77.png[/img] [b]Acetamol[/b]: mild non-addictive painkiller, though using too much can cause chemical damage [i][b]Cost[/b]: 1 herbal medicine and 1 wood log[/i]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/0OONkES.png[/img] [b]Opimol[/b]: moderate painkiller in the form of a gummy-paste, with some chance for addiction [i][b]Cost[/b]: 1 herbal medicine and 3 psychoid leaves[/i]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/dyqXSxY.png[/img] [b]Vicomol[/b]: good painkiller with moderate addiction chance, induces euphoria [i][b]Cost[/b]: 1 opimol and 1 neutroamine[/i]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/NTTDnxQ.png[/img] [b]Oxymol[/b]: amazing painkiller with terrifying addictiveness. High euphoria! [i][b]Cost[/b]: 2 opimol,1 neutroamine, and 10 silver[/i]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/8WJxTz3.png[/img] [b]Immunitol[/b]: quick strong boost to immune system [i][b]Cost[/b]: 1 herbal medicine, 3 smokeleaf leaves, and 1 steel[/i]
[h1]Languages[/h1] Japanese (Proxyer)
[img]https://i.imgur.com/2Zpv4mk.png[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/NpuFU7v.png[/img]
[b]Github:[/b] https://github.com/Neceros/MedicineExpanded
[img]https://i.imgur.com/s3KRLlu.gif[/img]
[b]Get help, Ask questions, Give suggestions:[/b] [url=https://discord.gg/AvV7DT5][img]https://i.imgur.com/lkEpF5w.png[/img][/url]
[b]My mods:[/b] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/TheBigN/myworkshopfiles/?appid=294100&p=1&numperpage=30][img]https://i.imgur.com/MD0xY84.png[/img][/url]
[b]Like these mods? Support me so I can make more:[/b] [url=https://ko-fi.com/Q5Q019Y8A][img]https://i.imgur.com/EHcTTRx.png[/img][/url]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/PwoNOj4.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [/list]
